title: Cloud Video Intelligence API - Beta Features
abstract:
# Cloud Video Intelligence API - Beta Features
The Video Intelligence API includes the following beta features:
- **Celebrity recognition** - Video Intelligence can be used to recognize celebrities in a video. [Learn more](/video-intelligence/docs/celebrity-recognition) 
- **Streaming** - Video Intelligence can provide streaming video annotation from a file. [Learn more](/video-intelligence/docs/streaming/streaming) 
- **Live streaming** - Video Intelligence can perform video annotation from a live video feed. [Learn more](/video-intelligence/docs/streaming/live-streaming-overview) 
See [Beta Client Libraries](/video-intelligence/docs/beta-libraries) for information on downloading the client libraries for beta features
